function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Malnourishment of children under 5 due to fathers holding the right to eating first in areas with scarce food","Impact":"Severe malnourishment and health problems for children under 5","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to ensure equitable food distribution within families","Technologies":"Food distribution programs, education on nutrition and child health","People":"Children under 5, families in food-scarce areas","Owner":"Local community leaders, government agencies"},{"Description":"Increase in population leading to compounded health problems and greater demand for healthcare services","Impact":"Financial pressure on healthcare systems and increased health risks due to human-human and human-environment contact","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare services, implementing disease prevention programs, and managing population growth through education and family planning","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure development, disease surveillance and response systems","People":"Residents of resource-constrained malarious regions","Owner":"Government health departments, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Rapid population growth leading to greater demand for new construction and workplace illnesses","Impact":"Deforestation, increased workplace illnesses, and additional financial pressures on public health services","Mitigation":"Sustainable urban planning, occupational health and safety regulations, and enforcement of environmental protection policies","Technologies":"Green building technologies, renewable construction materials, occupational health monitoring systems","People":"Construction workers, residents of urban areas with rapid growth","Owner":"Urban planning and development authorities, construction companies"}]}
